PAD_TunnelTurret.synopsis: Played when discovering one of the druid turret totems.
PAD_TunnelTurret.how_to_trigger: Roll a successful perception check on one of the druid totems in the tunnels.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The input contains only one session ('PAD_TunnelTurret'). With a single session in the data, there are no dependencies or ordering constraints with other sessions, nor any logical mutual exclusivity to consider.

PAD_TunnelTurret_0.text: Glowing eyes are rarely a good sign. Best be careful.
